long_description: The redesigned Petzl Spirit straight gate carabiner is lighter than before yet has the same smooth action that makes clipping bolts or pro quick and easy. H-shaped profile offers an improved strength-to-weight ratio over the previous version of the Spirit; 10g lighter than previous version. Rope-bearing surfaces are designed to enhance rope positioning and movement without adding excess weight. Key lock nose won't snag on pro, ropes or slings, making the 'biner simple to clip. Petzl Spirit straight gate carabiner is a great choice for the gear end of a quickdraw.
short_description: The redesigned Petzl Spirit straight gate carabiner is lighter than before yet has the same smooth action that makes clipping bolts or pro quick and easy.
